content: As provided in our current report from Form 8-K filed and updated on October 20th, given our elevated backlog, we have 100% coverage for product revenue in 2022 and we expect to shift 52,000 ATMs 25,000 self-checkout units and 127 points of sale terminals this year. Noting 15% variance in units would equate to approximately $100 million in revenue and approximately $30 million in adjusted EBITDA, depending on geography, customer and product mix. And as you know Europe has been very strong for us, but weâre now starting to have significant deployments in the US, which will also help us you know demonstrate how our solutions are capable in every â and probably the most challenging self-checkout market in the world, which is US groceries, and weâre making significant progress there. We clearly still have a lot of work to do in that market, and itâs an industry thatâs shaping it to â so I would really you know we want to be a part of this EV charging companies start developing their service model for the future.
